# NSBorderType.lineBorder

**Case**

A black line border around the view.

## Declaration

```swift
case lineBorder
```

## Constants

- **NSBorderType.bezelBorder**: A concave border that makes the view look sunken.
- **NSBorderType.grooveBorder**: A thin border that looks etched around the image.
- **NSBorderType.noBorder**: No border.
